articles.description: Dr Reddy's Laboratories said that the Russian vaccine, which is administered in two doses with a 21-day gap, should be taken from the same hospital
articles.content:
Dr Reddy's Laboratories on Tuesday said it initiated supply of the first dose component of Russian coronavirus vaccine Sputnik V to partner hospitals all over India.
